title: Coronavirus and employment for those aged 70 years and over, 65 years and over, and 60 years and over, in the UK
description: Share of employment for older workers of different age thresholds by industry, occupation, sector, sex, region and ethnic group.
datasetNotes: On the landing page under your download options click on the latest release
